article_title: Tech problems force Blue Cross NC to extend ACA payment deadline
article_text:
Customers unable to enroll, or are being placed in wrong plans

Blue Cross says call volume up 400 to 500 percent

Insurer says logjams caused by technology upgrade

article_metadata.title: Tech problems force Blue Cross NC to extend ACA payment deadline | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: Legions of customers of Blue Cross and Blue Shield have been unable to confirm they have health insurance, or have been billed for health insurance plans they never selected.
og.title: Tech problems force Blue Cross NC to extend ACA payment deadline
